module.name: scqc
module.description: Derives quality control (QC) parameters from waveforms.

parameter.name: CreatorId
parameter.description: ID of QC message creator

parameter.name: useConfiguredStreams
parameter.description: Limit QC determination to processed data streams which are defined in global bindings with detecLocid and detecStream.

parameter.name: use3Components
parameter.description: If useConfiguredStreams == true, then this parameter decides whether to use only the vertical component (default) or all three components. The 3 components are collected from the inventory according to channel orientation. If that is not possible, then the fixed components N and E will be used.

parameter.name: streamMask
parameter.description:
If useConfiguredStreams == false, then load (from inventory) only those streams, matching the streamMask
RegEx e.g. "^(NET1|NET2)\.(STA1|STA2|STA3)\.(LOC)\.((BH)|(LH)|(HH))Z$"
RegEx e.g. "^(.+)\.(.+)\.(.*)\.(.+)Z$"
streamMask = "^(.+)\.(.+)\.(.*)\.(BHZ)$"

parameter.name: dbLookBack
parameter.description: Database look up for past entries not older than x days (to determine the last QC parameter calculated).

group.name: plugins
group.description: Control parameters for individual QC plugins.

group.name: default
group.description: Default configuration parameters for the plugins. Can be overwritten by the individual plugin configurations.

parameter.name: realTimeOnly
parameter.description:
Enable to use this plugin only for realtime processing.
Default [disable]: plugin is able to process archived data AND realtime data streams.

parameter.name: buffer
parameter.description: Qc-Buffer Length [s] (aka LTA-Buffer). Must be >= plugins.*.bufferLength.

group.name: report
group.description: Control interactions with the messaging system.

parameter.name: interval
parameter.description: Interval for sending report messages which e.g. will be may be displayed by scqcv.

parameter.name: buffer
parameter.description: Time window for calculating QC reports.

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.description: Report messages are generated in case no data is received since timeout. Only in real-time processing.

group.name: archive
group.description: Control sending QC reports as notifier to the messaging where scmaster will write them to the database.

parameter.name: interval
parameter.description:
Interval to send the QC reports.
Default [-1]: Do not send any QC report. This will prevent writing QC reports into the database.

parameter.name: buffer
parameter.description: Time window for calculating QC reports.

group.name: alert
group.description: Control for sending alerts based on QC reports.

parameter.name: interval
parameter.description: Interval for checking and sending alert thresholds. -1 disables threshold checking.

parameter.name: buffer
parameter.description: Time window for calculating QC reports.

parameter.name: thresholds
parameter.description: List of thresholds for sending QC reports. Use comma to separate values.

group.name: QcLatency
group.description: Configuration parameters for the plugin qcplugin_latency. Overwrites the parameters from the default section.

parameter.name: realTimeOnly
parameter.description:
Enable to use this plugin only for realtime processing.
Default [disable]: plugin is able to process archived data AND realtime data streams.

parameter.name: buffer
parameter.description: Qc-Buffer Length [s] (aka LTA-Buffer). Must be >= plugins.*.bufferLength.

group.name: report
group.description: Control interactions with the messaging system.

parameter.description: Interval for sending report messages which, e.g., can be displayed by scqcv.

parameter.name: buffer
parameter.description: Time window for calculating QC reports.

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.description: Report messages are generated in case no data is received since timeout. Only in real-time processing.
